cast.overview: Starship C57D travels to planet Altair 4 in search of the crew of spaceship "Bellerophon," a scientific expedition that has been missing for twenty years. They find themselves unwelcome by the expedition's lone survivor and warned of destruction by an invisible force if they don't turn back immediately.
cast.title: Forbidden Planet

details.biography: Robert Dix was born on May 8, 1935 in Los Angeles, California, USA as Robert Warren Brimmer. He was an actor and writer, known for Forbidden Planet (1956), Five Bloody Graves (1969) and Young Jesse James (1960). He was married to Lynette Avery Allen, Jeanette P Dunn, Darlene Lucht, Anna Mae Slaughter and Janet Lake. He died on August 6, 2018 in Tucson, Arizona, USA.
details.name: Robert Dix
